com.google.ase.trigger
Class AlarmTriggerManager

java.lang.Object
  com.google.ase.trigger.AlarmTriggerManager

public class AlarmTriggerManager
extends java.lang.Object

A class keeping track of currently scheduled alarms in cooperation with the TriggerRepository.

Author:
Felix Arends (felix.arends@gmail.com)

Method Detail

scheduleInexactRepeating

public void scheduleInexactRepeating(double interval,
                                     java.lang.String script,
                                     boolean wakeUp)
Schedules the repeated execution of a script. The intervals may vary slightly. This is more power efficient than scheduleRepeating.

Parameters:
interval - interval between script invocations, in seconds
script - script to execute
wakeUp - wake up the device even when asleep

scheduleRepeating

public void scheduleRepeating(java.lang.Double interval,
                              java.lang.String script,
                              boolean wakeup)
Schedules the repeated execution of a script.

Parameters:
interval - interval between executions, in seconds
script - script to execute
wakeup - if true then the phone will wake up when the alarm goes off

schedule

public void schedule(java.lang.Double executionTimeS,
                     java.lang.String script,
                     boolean wakeup)
Schedules the execution of a script at a specific point of time.

Parameters:
executionTimeS - time of execution, in seconds since epoch
script - script to execute
wakeup - whether or not to wakeup the phone if its asleep

cancelByScriptName

public void cancelByScriptName(java.lang.String script)
Cancels the scheduled execution of a script.

Parameters:
script - name of the script whose scheduled invocation to cancel

cancelById

public void cancelById(long triggerId)
Cancels the scheduled execution of the trigger with the given id.

Parameters:
triggerId - id of the trigger to cancel
